GSD.description: An issue in the /index.php/user/edit_user/ component of Book Store Management System v1.0 allows unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the password hashes of all existing user accounts via a crafted request.

osvSchema.details: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2022-4228. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2022-4228. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2022-4228 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

description_data.value: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2022-4228. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2022-4228. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2022-4228 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

An issue in the /index.php/user/edit_user/ component of Book Store Management System v1.0 allows unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the password hashes of all existing user accounts via a crafted request.
